column2: none of the hosts nor Cindy smiled. Perhaps it is awkward for them to serve one person dining in? I was never asked if I was new or if I had any questions with the menu. I most definitely felt rushed by Cindy and did not feel like she cared. She simply took me to my booth
column4: and came back in less than two minutes to ask if I know what I want to order. I did have a question between two different ramen options on the menu and she simply gave me a straight answer that I do not know how else to explain but simply say she just wanted to get this over with. So I simply ordered based off of what I know and looking at the menu. I understand when it is rush-hour
column5: but that night there were quite a few empty booths.
